title: Plex Buyer
text: You're offered $25,000 per unit for all duplexes, 4plex, 8plex. If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property

title: House Buyer
text: You're offered $110,000 for a 3/2 rental house. If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

title: Small Business Improves
text: The small business you founded lucked out. Your sales increase 150% and your monthly net income goes up $400
